value.title: GNS Healthcare
value.excerpt: We solve healthcare’s matching problem. We provide technology, services, and solutions that precisely match health interventions to individuals, helping our clients improve health outcomes and avoid the billions of healthcare dollars wasted on ineffective treatments.
value.name: GNS Healthcare
value.overview: We solve healthcare’s matching problem. We provide technology, services, and solutions that precisely match health interventions to individuals, helping our clients improve health outcomes and avoid the billions of healthcare dollars wasted on ineffective treatments.

value.title: Lumiata
value.excerpt: Lumiata is the industry's first AI Platform purpose-built for healthcare. Lumiata is powered by 75 million-member data, proprietary clinical, risk and financial algorithms, and industry leading data science and machine learning talent. We help Business, Benefits and Care Management teams at health plans, providers and employers make better decisions–– from identifying and managing individual's risk to retaining customers in competitive insurance markets–– using easy-to-use, fast-to-deploy AI applications. The Lumiata AI Platform also arms internal data science teams in healthcare organizations rapidly develop and deploy predictive models and applications. Silicon Valley-based Lumiata is backed by tier 1 investors Khosla Ventures, BlueCross BlueShield Venture Partners, Sandbox Industries and Intel Capital.

value.title: MaxQ AI
value.excerpt: MaxQ AI is at the forefront Medical Diagnostic AI. Our mission is to meaningfully reduce misdiagnosis and healthcare costs by making artificial intelligence (AI) intrinsic to the diagnostic process for time sensitive and life-threatening conditions. We are transforming healthcare by empowering physicians to provide “smarter care” through intelligent imaging with AI actionable insights.

value.title: Skychain Global
value.excerpt: Skydio makes every aspect of flying drones more creative, more fun, more useful, and less stressful with groundbreaking artificial intelligence.

value.title: Suki
value.excerpt: Suki is an AI-powered, voice-enabled digital assistant for doctors that lifts the burden of documentation, enabling them to focus on what they love: treating patients.
value.name: Suki
value.overview: Suki is an AI-powered, voice-enabled digital assistant for doctors that lifts the burden of documentation, enabling them to focus on what they love: treating patients.

value.title: BenevolentAI
value.excerpt: BenevolentAI is the global leader in the development and application of artificial intelligence (“AI”) for scientific innovation. We aim to accelerate the journey from inventive ideas to medicines for patients by developing AI to generate new treatments for some of the world’s 8,000 untreated diseases.

value.title: Brainomix
value.excerpt: Brainomix’s vision is to be a world leader in imaging software to support clinical decision making, for neurological and cerebrovascular diseases.
value.name: Brainomix
value.overview: Brainomix’s vision is to be a world leader in imaging software to support clinical decision making, for neurological and cerebrovascular diseases.

value.title: Insitro
value.excerpt: A data-driven biotech advancing better medicines with predictive models, created by machine learning & biology at scale
value.name: Insitro
value.overview: A data-driven biotech advancing better medicines with predictive models, created by machine learning & biology at scale

value.title: Metabiota
value.excerpt: Metabiota leverages health, science and data analytics to gain actionable insights into human and animal health.
value.name: Metabiota
value.overview: Metabiota leverages health, science and data analytics to gain actionable insights into human and animal health.

value.title: Winterlight Labs
value.excerpt: Like a lighthouse providing early warning in the dark of night, changes in language can signal cognitive decline decades before symptoms of dementia become apparent. Currently, over 47.5 million individuals in the world have dementia, and that number is expected to triple by 2050.

value.title: Olive
value.excerpt: Olive figures out where she can have an impact, onboards quickly, does her job extremely well, and gets smarter over time. For more information, visit www.hireolive.com.
value.name: Olive
value.overview: Olive figures out where she can have an impact, onboards quickly, does her job extremely well, and gets smarter over time. For more information, visit www.hireolive.com.

value.title: Zymergen
value.excerpt: Founded in 2013 and based in the San Francisco Bay Area, Zymergen integrates automation, machine learning, and genomics to rapidly accelerate the pace of scientific advancement. We treat the genome as a search space, leveraging machine learning to make discoveries far beyond the bounds of human intuition. In doing so, we deliver economic value, material diversity and performance capabilities not previously possible.
